title: Front Cover
content: Restoration of Acropora coral around Koh Tao island, Thailand. The cover image relates to Research Article “Deep learning for multi-label classification of coral reef conditions in the Indo-Pacific using underwater photo transect method” [https://doi.org/10.1002/aqc.4241] by Shao et al. Photo credit: New Heaven Reef Conservation Program.
siteTitle: Wiley: Aquatic Conservation: Marine and Freshwater Ecosystems: Table of Contents
